value.title: StarCraft 2: THE KEIRON - Very High Quality Custom Race! (Fourth Race Contest)
value.excerpt: A few games in StarCraft 2 from "The Fourth Race Contest" organised by Alex007. In this video I feature the Keiron, easily the highest quality custom made faction for StarCraft 2 that I've seen so far.
